test.name: T27- O usuário deve poder interagir com os botões da página de conta

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Dado que acessei o aplicativo Nubank Clone
Apertar botão de incompatibilidade de versões Android
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="android:id/button1"]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//android.widget.Button[@resource-id="android:id/button1"]'.
xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@resource-id="android:id/button1"]
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View [@content-desc="Olá, Breno Freitas"]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View [contains(@content-desc, 'Conta')]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//android.view.View [contains(@content-desc, 'Conta')]'.
xpath criteria: //android.view.View [contains(@content-desc, 'Conta')]
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.widget.HorizontalScrollView/android.widget.Button[1]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//android.widget.HorizontalScrollView/android.widget.Button[1]'.
xpath criteria: //android.widget.HorizontalScrollView/android.widget.Button[1]
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Então posso usar os recursos da seção de depósito
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View [@content-desc="Pix Sem custo e cai na hora, mesmo de madrugada e fim de semana."]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Text
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Como você quer depositar na sua conta do Nubank'.
kw.arg: Como você quer depositar na sua conta do Nubank
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `text`.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

kw.name: Close All Applications
kw.doc: Closes all open applications.
